warscrolls.name: Abyssal Tendril
warscrolls.fluff: When an Incarnate of the Deep senses a distant enemy, it conjures a serpentine tendril of frothing, icy water to hold them fast. Those caught in the choking embrace of this manifestation can do nothing but struggle helplessly as the life is slowly crushed from their body.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Incarnate, Ward (6+), Order, Idoneth Deepkin

abilities.name: Crushing Coil
abilities.lore: Once the tendril has its victim, it begins to squeeze with bone-splintering strength.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN MANIFESTATIONS that target an ensnared enemy unit.

abilities.name: Watery Clutch
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Just as an ocean current seizes a helpless creature and drags it down to its doom, so too do the Incarnate’s tendrils ensnare and drown their victims.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this MANIFESTATION to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, the target is ensnared for the rest of the turn.

A unit cannot use commands while it is ensnared.

warscrolls.name: Akhelian Allopex
warscrolls.fluff: Allopexes are vicious predators of the deep, known for their voracious appetites. As Akhelian bond-beasts, they are more dangerous still, boasting scythed fins and deadly back-mounted harpoon launchers. Even the bravest fear these finned menaces.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Fly, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian

abilities.name: Ensnared
abilities.lore: The Akhelians are experts at ensnaring their prey with a well-placed harpoon or Retarius net.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy MONSTER or CAVALRY unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit’s shooting attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

abilities.name: Bloodthirsty Predators
abilities.lore: Allopexes are drawn towards the scent of freshly spilt blood.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Allopex’s Ferocious Bite while it is within 6" of any damaged enemy units or while it is within 6" of any enemy units that had any models slain in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Akhelian Ishlaen Guard
warscrolls.fluff: Ishlaen Guard channel the bioelectricity of Fangmora mounts into their galv-shields, manifesting this energy as a sparking field that turns aside enemy blows. Thanks to this protective aura, the Ishlaen are often assigned as the bodyguards of Akhelian Kings or other high-ranking Idoneth, seeking the closest threats and laying them low with sweeps of their helsabres.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Fly, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian

abilities.name: Biovoltaic Barrier
abilities.lore: The biovoltaic energy produced by Fangmora Eels is channelled by Ishlaen Guard into a crackling luminescent energy field that protects them from harm.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target unit’s weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Galv-shields
abilities.lore: Thanks to their protective aura, the Ishlaen have greater staying power in prolonged combat than their spear-armed kin.
abilities.effect: This unit has WARD (5+) if it charged in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Akhelian King
warscrolls.fluff: Akhelian Kings are the war leaders of the Idoneth enclaves. Mounted atop fierce and intelligent Deepmares, these inspiring commanders fight at the forefront of every battle, urging their Phalanxes forward as they wield their blades with deadly skill.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Fly, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian

melee.name: Deepmare’s Fangs, Talons and Lashing Tails

abilities.name: Wave Rider
abilities.lore: When an Akhelian King charges the foe, they hit with the power of a crashing wave.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s Akhelian Royal Weapons for attacks that target that enemy unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Crest of the Wave
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Riding the momentum of the ethersea, the Akhelian King leads a glorious charge to shatter the enemy ranks.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by other friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units for attacks that target enemy units in combat with this unit.

warscrolls.name: Akhelian Leviadon
warscrolls.fluff: A monstrous undersea titan, the Leviadon is covered in thick scales and protected by an impenetrable shell. In addition to its powerful jaws and bladed fins, it carries a hard-bitten crew and twin harpoon launchers, making it a veritable living fortress.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Fly, Ward (5+), Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian

melee.name: Leviadon’s Scythed Fins and Crushing Jaws

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Leviadon’s Scythed Fins and Crushing Jaws is 5.

abilities.name: Void Drum
abilities.lore: A void drummer rides on the back of every Akhelian Leviadon. The mesmerising rhythm that they beat out sends rippling currents through the air, distorting the outlines of the drummer’s comrades and making them hard to see.
abilities.effect: Friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units have WARD (5+) while they are wholly within 6" of this unit.

abilities.name: Crushing Charge
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: When a Leviadon charges into battle, it crushes the foe with its sheer mass.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy INFANTRY unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target unit has more than 10 models. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Akhelian Morrsarr Guard
warscrolls.fluff: Armed with voltspears and galv-shields, the Morrsarr Guard function as heavy shock cavalry, their fearsome weapons channelling the powerful electrical energy given off by the Fangmoras. This shockwave is loosed moments before the Morrsarr crash into the enemy, blasting the front ranks even as the Akhelians’ spears strike home.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Fly, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian

abilities.name: Biovoltaic Blast
abilities.lore: The biovoltaic energy produced by Fangmora Eels is stored by Morrsarr Guard, ready to be discharged as a bolt of energy when the time is right.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in this unit. Add 1 to each roll if there are more models in the target unit than this unit. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Akhelian Thrallmaster
warscrolls.fluff: Thrallmasters are cunning and sea-scarred Akhelians who lead the Namarti hosts into battle. Master duellists skilled with all manner of exotic weaponry, they scythe through their foes with contemptuous ease.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian

abilities.name: Akhelian Insights
abilities.lore: Thrallmasters are cunning and sea-scarred Akhelians who lead the Namarti hosts into battle. Master duellists skilled with all manner of exotic weaponry, they scythe through their foes with contemptuous ease.
abilities.effect: Melee weapons used by friendly NAMARTI units have Crit (2 Hits) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Thrallmaster
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Thrallmasters are cunning and sea-scarred Akhelians who lead the Namarti hosts into battle.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly NAMARTI THRALLS unit that has not used a FIGHT ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a FIGHT ability immediately after the FIGHT ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Cyreni's Razors
warscrolls.fluff: A true master of the abyss, Cyreni leads her guards through the most inhospitable of places in search of precious soulstuff. She wields the power of a Tidecaster with crushing pressure and an icy chill, having trained in the art of soul-magic in Ulgu’s depths. Cyreni’s guards are hand-picked from the most skilled of the Namarti warrior caste. Clad in thick armour, their wicked serrated glaives can tear the guts out of their foes. Alongside them swims Cephanyr, a creature of the deep capable of sensing soulstuff from great distances.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian, Namarti

abilities.name: Phase Ink
abilities.lore: Cephanyr emits a cloud of ink as black as the abyss that shrouds the enemy and sows confusion.
abilities.declare: If this unit’s Cephanyr is on the battlefield, pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Cyreni of the Abyss
abilities.lore: As a Tidecaster, Cyreni can draw upon the swirling currents of the ethersea in battle.
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Cyreni of the Abyss is on the battlefield, it has WIZARD (1).

warscrolls.name: Eidolon of Mathlann, Aspect of the Sea
warscrolls.fluff: An Eidolon of Mathlann is a mystical conjuration that embodies a long-forgotten god. When summoned in its aspect of the sea, this entity can call upon the magic of the ocean to bolster allies or send enemies fleeing in terror.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Ward (5+), Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Eidolon

abilities.name: Tranquillity of the Abyss
abilities.lore: An Eidolon in its aspect of the sea radiates an aura of unnatural tranquillity, calming any fears that nearby Idoneth may harbour.
abilities.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to the control scores of friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Tsunami of Terror
abilities.lore: With a wave of its sceptre, the Eidolon sends forth invisible waves of fear that cause even the bravest of opponents to cower.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different visible enemy units within 12" of this unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for combat attacks that target those units until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Vengeful Waves
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: When threatened, the Eidolon causes the ethersea to crash around it, overwhelming its enemies.
abilities.declare: If this unit has not charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Dormant Energies
abilities.lore: The Isharann aspect of an Eidolon of Mathlann seethes with suppressed energies that it can draw upon at need.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

warscrolls.name: Eidolon of Mathlann, Aspect of the Storm
warscrolls.fluff: In its aspect of the storm an Eidolon of Mathlann is the vengeance of the Idoneth made manifest, a living tempest that surges upwards before crashing upon the foe with tidal‑wave force.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Ward (5+), Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Eidolon

melee.name: Spear of Repressed Fury and Crulhook

abilities.name: Crashing Upon The Foe
abilities.lore: The Eidolon surges up into the sky before crashing down like a tidal wave, reforming to dive again and again until nothing is left of the enemy.
abilities.effect: This unit can use CHARGE abilities even if it used a RETREAT ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by RETREAT  abilities.

abilities.name: Pulled Into The Depths
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: The viciously barbed crulhook can ensnare unfortunate foes.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy HERO in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has STRIKE‑LAST for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Drench With Hate
abilities.lore: The mere presence of an Eidolon in its warrior aspect is enough to imbue nearby Idoneth with a fierce and bitter hate.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Elathain's Soulraid
warscrolls.fluff: Elathain was dubbed the Ill-fated for failing to harvest the essence of Ghur’s Silent People. Yet the Soulrender remains dedicated as ever, wielding the grim tools of his trade to claim a bounty of spirits. Elathain’s companions are a disparate lot, the Akhelian knight Fuirann battling alongside the Namarti Tammael and the bond-beasts Duinclaw and Spinefin. Together, however, they fight as one to claim souls for their enclave.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian, Namarti

abilities.name: Soulnet
abilities.lore: A soulnet can be used to ensnare a victim, ensuring they cannot escape their doom at the hands of the Soulrender.
abilities.declare: If this unit’s Elathain Ill-fated is on the battlefield, pick an enemy INFANTRY unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Elathain's Lurelight
abilities.lore: Like all Isharann Soulrenders, Elathain possesses a mystical lure that can trap the souls of slain opponents so that they can be used to resurrect fallen allies.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, return a number of slain models to this unit equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Gloomtide Shipwreck
warscrolls.fluff: A Gloomtide Shipwreck is a supernatural manifestation in the ethersea, a barnacle-encrusted ruin swarming with vicious deep-sea creatures that provides nearby Idoneth with cover from which to launch their attacks.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Order, Idoneth Deepkin

abilities.name: Guardians of the Deep
abilities.lore: Shoals of small sea creatures infest this wreck, instinctively swarming out to shield Idoneth Deepkin that are nearby.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to save rolls for friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN INFANTRY and CAVALRY units while they are wholly within 6" of this terrain feature.

abilities.name: Phantasmal Ruin
abilities.lore: Gloomtide Shipwrecks are apparitions of sunken vessels filled with ethereal creatures that strike out at those who stray too close.
abilities.effect:
Models can pass through this terrain feature but cannot be set up on or end moves on any part of this terrain feature.

Each time an enemy unit ends a move that passed through or across this terrain feature, roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Rise From The Depths
abilities.lore: Ancient wreckages adrift in the great currents of the ethersea provide a haven for Idoneth.
abilities.declare: This ability must be used instead of the ‘Deploy Faction Terrain’ ability.
abilities.effect:
Set up this faction terrain either as 1 terrain feature consisting of 2 scenery pieces (that must be set up within 3" of each other) or as 2 separate terrain features. Set up each terrain feature wholly within friendly territory and more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features. After you have done so, it has been deployed.

If this faction terrain is set up as 1 terrain feature consisting of 2 scenery pieces, it has a Health characteristic of 14 instead of 7.

warscrolls.name: Ikon of the Sea
warscrolls.fluff: Channelling the unfathomable calm and foreboding immensity of the deepest waters, Ikons of the Sea surge into battle alongside their Idoneth kin, overwhelming the enemy with their unwavering focus and terrifying momentum. To witness such martial perfection is an inspiration to any Idoneth warrior.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian

abilities.name: The Surging Sea
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase
abilities.lore: The Ikon’s aura of calm yet fearsome power sweeps up nearby Idoneth, carrying them into battle like a racing current.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 1 friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN unit within this unit’s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the targets, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Rapid Approach
abilities.lore: Moving with liquid speed and uncanny agility, the Ikon is on its foes before they have a chance to react.
abilities.effect: This unit can use a RUN ability and still use CHARGE abilities later in the turn.

warscrolls.name: Ikon of the Storm
warscrolls.fluff: Ikons of the Storm aim to embody the destructive force of a raging ocean. Wielding twin blades, they hurl themselves into battle, heedless of any personal danger as they carve their enemies apart. Foes are helpless in the face of the Ikon’s whirling maelstrom of steel, and those with a mind to flee are cut down before they can take a single step.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian

abilities.name: Storm of Blades
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Channelling the frothing violence of a maelstrom, the Ikon of the Storm lashes out again and again.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 FIGHT abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Whirlpool's Fury
abilities.lore: An Ikon of the Storm is a vortex of rage, overwhelming enemies and inspiring their kin to fight ever harder.
abilities.effect:
Enemy units cannot use RETREAT abilities while they are in combat with this unit.

Friendly units that use a RETREAT ability while they are wholly within 12" of this unit can still use SHOOT and/or CHARGE abilities later in the turn.

No mortal damage is inflicted on friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units by RETREAT abilities while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Incarnate of the Deep
warscrolls.fluff: Conjured through elemental ritual and empowered by the spirits of the ocean, an Incarnate of the Deep is a ship-breaking tempest given physical form. Reaching out with serpent-like appendages, it seizes its prey and draws them inexorably in, drowning them within its turbulent mass.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Incarnate, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Idoneth Deepkin

abilities.name: Wild Form
abilities.lore: This manifestation is notoriously wilful, resisting any effort by sorcerers to tame or banish it.
abilities.effect: Each time this MANIFESTATION is targeted by the ‘Banish Manifestation’ ability, if it would be banished, it is not banished. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Grasping Tendrils
abilities.lore: The Incarnate reaches out across the ethersea to conjure tendrils of freezing, coiling water.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if it is your turn. On a 4+:

•  You can remove 1 friendly Abyssal Tendril from the battlefield.
•  If there are fewer than 2 friendly Abyssal Tendrils on the battlefield, you can set up an Abyssal Tendril wholly within 9" of this MANIFESTATION.

abilities.name: Surrender to the Sea
abilities.lore: If the Incarnate is driven back from the enemy, its tendrils slink back into the ethersea too.
abilities.effect: When this MANIFESTATION is removed from play, each friendly Abyssal Tendril on the battlefield is automatically removed from play.

warscrolls.name: Isharann Soulrender
warscrolls.fluff: Unlike the rest of their Isharann kin, Soulrenders fight face to face with their foes, reaping spirit-matter with every swing of their scythe-like talúnhooks. In battle, they can channel their mystical powers to revive fallen Namarti.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Isharann

abilities.name: Hangman's Knot
abilities.lore: The noose on a talúnhook can be used to ensnare a victim, ensuring they cannot escape their doom at the hands of the Soulrender.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy HERO in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, it is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Lurelight
abilities.lore: Isharann Soulrenders possess a mystical lure that is used to draw unto them the souls of slain opponents so that they can be captured. Should the Soulrender act quickly enough, the stolen essence can be repurposed to resurrect fallen Namarti mid-battle.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different friendly NAMARTI units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets. You cannot pick the same unit to be the target of this ability more than once per turn.
abilities.effect: Make a lurelight roll of D3 for each target unit. On a 2+, return a number of slain models to the target unit equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Isharann Soulscryer
warscrolls.fluff: Soulscryers work their strange magics to navigate the utter darkness of the deep places. Their eldritch senses allow them to guide other Idoneth along hidden paths in the realms’ oceans and rivers, so that they can strike the foe from unexpected angles.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Isharann

abilities.name: Finder of Ways
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘Unpredictable Tide’ ability or the ‘Steed of Tides’ ability
abilities.lore: Soulscryers are the Idoneth’s navigators, helping them divine hidden paths through the realmseas.
abilities.effect: Instead of setting up the targets as described in the ability used, set them up on the battlefield wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 7" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Isharann Tidecaster
warscrolls.fluff: Isharann Tidecasters are the Idoneth’s most potent frontline wizards, capable of directing the surging currents of the ethersea in order to alter the momentum of battle or to steal the very breath from their foes.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Isharann

abilities.name: Master of the Ethersea
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: A Tidecaster can manipulate the ethersea like no other.
abilities.declare: Make an Isharann ritual roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
On a 3+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn:

Creeping Mist: Friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units cannot be targeted by shooting attacks unless the attacking model is within 12" of them.

Surging Stream: Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units.

Spiteful Riptide: Each time an enemy unit uses a RETREAT ability, after the effect of that ability has been resolved, inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit.

warscrolls.name: Lotann, Warden of the Soul Ledgers
warscrolls.fluff: Lotann is the Warden of the Soul Ledgers, whose task it is to oversee the reaping of spirit-essences across the enclaves. A skilled arcanist in his own right, Lotann channels the gestalt memories of the Idoneth to empower his kin.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Isharann

abilities.name: Empowered By Memory
abilities.lore: Lotann draws on the accumulated memories of his people to grant his allies supernatural strength and resolve.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN unit wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target’s melee weapons have Crit (Auto-wound) for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Catalogue of Souls
abilities.lore: The Soul Wardens keep records of the souls that are harvested by the phalanxes.
abilities.effect: Each time an enemy unit is destroyed, give this unit a soul‑quota token.

abilities.name: Fount of Willpower
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Reaction: You declared a **SPELL** ability for a friendly **ISHARANN** unit wholly within 12" of this unit
abilities.lore: Such is Lotann’s obsessive commitment to his duty that his willpower bleeds out into the ethersea, a potent magical force that can be drawn upon to empower his fellow Isharann.
abilities.effect: Remove 1 of this unit’s soul-quota tokens. Then, you can re‑roll the casting roll.

warscrolls.name: Mathaela, Oracle of the Abyss
warscrolls.fluff: Mysterious and terrifying, the Oracle of the Abyss only rises from their lightless domain when the existence of the Deepkin is threatened. Wielding the crushing magic of the deepest ocean planes, Mathaela annihilates the Idoneth’s foes and stirs the very realmseas into violent motion.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Isharann

abilities.name: Crushing Pressure
abilities.lore: Mathaela subjects their foes to the devastating pressure of the deepest trenches, causing bones to shatter and metal to crumple like paper.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the target’s Health characteristic, to a maximum of 10. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Siren Song of the Abyss
abilities.lore: More attuned to the heartbeat of the ocean than any Isharann, Mathaela can stir the seas to thrashing life with but a gesture.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ Companion weapons.

warscrolls.name: Namarti Reavers
warscrolls.fluff: Armed with silent‑firing whisperbows, Namarti Reavers are the fast‑moving scouts and archers of the Idoneth Deepkin Phalanxes. Despite their eerie and disturbing lack of eyes, they are uncannily accurate, using senses other than sight to pinpoint their targets.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Namarti

abilities.name: Strike on the Move
abilities.lore: Namarti Reavers are experts at running out from cover to unleash a hail of deadly arrows.
abilities.effect: This unit can use SHOOT abilities even if it used a RUN or RETREAT ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Namarti Thralls
warscrolls.fluff: The core infantry of the Idoneth Deepkin, Namarti Thralls advance into battle brandishing vast two-handed weapons known as lanmari. Despite their blindness and the heft of their blades, they whirl and chop with aelven grace.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Namarti

abilities.name: Sweeping Blows
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: A Namarti Thrall’s aggressive swiping strikes are intended to knock their enemies off their feet.
abilities.effect: If any damage points inflicted by attacks made as part of that FIGHT ability are allocated to any enemy units, subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made by those enemy units for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Akhelian Thrallmaster
warscrolls.fluff: Many ruthless Akhelian Thrallmasters ply the coasts of the Everspring Swathe, seeking out the rich accumulations of souls that can be found there. Masters of guerrilla warfare, these swordmasters and their Namarti warriors use the environment to protect them against enemy attacks as they advance, before charging in to deliver a killing strike.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian

abilities.name: Way of the Vortex
abilities.lore: The riptide’s undertow pulls allies from harm, a hidden bulwark against the enemy’s raging storm. Within its grasp, Namarti endure, shielded by the Akhelian’s unwavering stance.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target this unit and friendly NAMARTI units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Raider Captain
abilities.lore: Thrallmasters are often among the first of the Idoneth’s forces to arrive on the battlefield, leading Namarti scouting parties to establish forward positions from which they can launch their raid.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 3 friendly Namarti Thralls units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Each target can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Namarti Thralls
warscrolls.fluff: Namarti Thralls have proved as skilled in waging strike-and-fade war amidst the jungles of Ghyran as they are in the kelp forests of their undersea home. Enhanced by the ethersea, their extrasensory powers allow them to isolate their prey, lashing out with their lanmari blades before retreating into the shadows under the cover of briny mists.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Namarti

abilities.name: Hit-and-Run Tactics
abilities.lore: The Namarti Thralls strike at their foes before using the ethersea to fall back to a safer position.
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat or charged this turn, this unit can make a pile-in move. Then, if this unit is in combat, you must pick 1 or more enemy units to be the target(s) of this unit’s attacks.
abilities.effect: Resolve combat attacks against the target unit(s). Then, if this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units but can only end that move in combat with units it was in combat with at the start of that move. It does not have to end the move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Volturnos, High King of the Deep
warscrolls.fluff: Volturnos is the last of the Cythai, a warrior whose cunning and prowess are legendary. Riding to battle atop Uasall, Prince of Deepmares, the High King carves a path through the foe, inspiring the Idoneth to ever greater deeds.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Fly, Order, Idoneth Deepkin, Aelf, Akhelian

melee.name: Uasall’s Fangs, Talons and Lashing Tails

abilities.name: Cealith, the High King's Shield
abilities.lore: Cealith is said to have been crafted by Teclis himself. However it was created, the mystical aura it projects guards the bearer against malign magics.
abilities.effect: This unit has WARD (3+) against mortal damage inflicted by SPELL abilities, PRAYER abilities or abilities used by MANIFESTATIONS.

abilities.name: Supreme Lord of Tides
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: At the High King’s command, his warriors will attack with unrelenting fury.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 other friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: First Among Akhelians
abilities.lore: Volturnos is the greatest Akhelian King to have ever lived. His supreme skill and vast experience serve as an inspiration to all members of the Idoneth’s warrior caste.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by other friendly AKHELIAN units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

rules.name: Surge Forward
rules.lore: The Namarti are the lowest caste in Idoneth society, but when formed into a Namarti Corps and led to battle by their Akhelian masters, they strike swiftly and with devastating effect.
rules.effect: You can re-roll run rolls and charge rolls for friendly NAMARTI units while they are wholly within 12" of a friendly AKHELIAN unit.

rules.name: Outflank The Enemy
rules.lore: Used to living on the periphery of society, these Idoneth are expert at blending into the shadows and using hidden paths to traverse the battlefield.
rules.effect:
While a friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN unit is wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge:

• Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target that unit if it has not charged this turn.
• Add 2" to the Move characteristic of that unit.

rules.name: Fade Like Mist
rules.lore: The Soul-raid Ambushers are experts in hit-and-run tactics, riding the currents of the ethersea to strike the foe from new directions.
rules.effect: When using the ‘Unpredictable Tide’ ability, you can pick up to 2 eligible targets instead of 1.

rules.name: Ferocious Predators
rules.lore: With the aid of the Embailors, the Akhelian Beastmasters are able to turn oceanic carnivores into truly terrifying weapons of war.
rules.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made with Companion weapons by friendly AKHELIAN units.

rules.name: Blood In The Water
rules.lore: As the gore of the slain diffuses through the ethersea, ancient predators are drawn to battle.
rules.declare: If any friendly or enemy units were destroyed this turn, pick a friendly Akhelian Allopex unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
rules.effect: Set up a replacement unit identical to the target wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

rules.name: Wisdom of the Deep
rules.lore: The Isharann are born with a talent for harnessing arcane forces. This power is only amplified when these aelves convene an Isharann Council and head to war.
rules.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls, Isharann ritual rolls and lurelight rolls for friendly ISHARANN units while they are within the combat ranges of any other friendly ISHARANN units.

artefacts.name: Crest of the Ionrach
artefacts.lore: This crystal relic of the Ionrach is granted only to its greatest heroes and most rigorous defenders.

artefacts.name: Ammonite Carnyx
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
artefacts.lore: This war-horn is carved from pearlescent shell. When blown, its thundering call summons every nearby Idoneth to battle.
artefacts.declare: Pick a friendly CHORRILEUM NAMARTI unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Armour of the Cythai
artefacts.lore: This gleaming panoply was given by Teclis to the ancestors of the Idoneth. Upon the command of its bearer, it can radiate the power of Hysh – a fitting property for a gift from the Great Illuminator.
artefacts.effect: If this unit has not charged this turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks made by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

artefacts.name: Lifekelp Pod
artefacts.lore: Radiant with Ghyranite energy, this golden seed pod bursts in a spray of vital power.
artefacts.effect: Heal (D3) each friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN CAVALRY unit within this unit’s combat range.

artefacts.name: Dritchleech
artefacts.lore: Incredibly rare, these worms feed upon magic and are capable of draining arcane energies.
artefacts.effect: Subtract 1 from casting rolls for enemy WIZARDS while they are within 18" of this unit. In addition, each time an enemy spell fails, after that ability has been resolved, Heal (1) this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Prodigy of the Asydrzor
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared an **ASYDRAZOR** ability for a friendly FIRST PHALANX unit wholly within 12" of this unit
heroicTraits.lore: A true product of the Deepkin’s martial enlightenment, this warrior is renowned for their strategic brilliance.
heroicTraits.effect: No asydrazor points are spent to use that ability.

heroicTraits.name: Serve the Enclave
heroicTraits.lore: With the fate of their people at stake, this hero inspires a fearless resolve in those Namarti under their command.
heroicTraits.effect: While this unit and a friendly CHORRILEUM NAMARTI unit are contesting the same objective, this unit has a control score of 10 that cannot be modified.

heroicTraits.name: Merciless Raider
heroicTraits.lore: This aelf gives no quarter to the enemies of the Idoneth. When in the vicinity of a wounded foe, they surge forwards to finish the job.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is within 6" of a damaged enemy unit, this unit can move 6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units but must end that move in combat with a damaged enemy unit.

heroicTraits.name: Lord of Storm and Sea
heroicTraits.lore: This hero is a living embodiment of the glory of Mathlann and an inspiration to all those who still worship the Lord of the Deep.
heroicTraits.effect: Each time an ability returns at least 1 slain model to a friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit, after that ability has been resolved, you can return 1 additional slain model to it.

heroicTraits.name: Endless Sea-storm
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
heroicTraits.lore: This hero summons the force of the ethersea to batter their foes with waves of pelagic force.
heroicTraits.effect:
If this unit is a WIZARD, add 1 to its power level for the rest of the turn. If this unit is not a WIZARD, it gains WIZARD (1) for the rest of the turn.

In addition, add 2 to the next casting roll or banishment roll for this unit this turn.

heroicTraits.name: Nightmare Legacy
heroicTraits.lore: The repressed horror of the Idoneth’s long incarceration emanates from this dark-visaged warrior in palpable waves of doom.
heroicTraits.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 6" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Form of the Fangmora
heroicTraits.lore: This champion has mastered a defensive sword-art that mimics the fluid movements of the swift Fangmora Eels.
heroicTraits.effect: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack that targets this unit is 1-3, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.

heroicTraits.name: Hunter of Souls
heroicTraits.lore: This hero seeks neither glory nor territory; their only interest is the capture of potent soul-stuff.
heroicTraits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following weapon abilities for this unit’s melee weapons to have this battle:
•  Anti-CAVALRY (+1 Rend)
•  Anti-INFANTRY (+1 Rend)
•  Anti-MONSTER (+1 Rend)

other.name: Voidchill Darkness
other.lore: This breed can turn the ethersea around it ice-cold and dark.
other.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit if this unit charged this turn.

other.name: Deep Connection
other.lore: These mounts are so attuned to their riders’ emotions that they can instinctively predict their next command.
other.effect: Ignore the effect of the Companion weapon ability on this unit’s weapons.

other.name: Swift-Finned Skirmisher
other.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for this unit
other.lore: These creatures react to subtle ripples in the ethersea to avoid danger.
other.effect: If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that this unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.

other.name: Hunt of the Bloodthirsty Shiver
other.lore: Advancing in tandem, the Akhelian Allopexes either evade the foe in skilled formation or close in to deliver the killing bite.
other.effect:
If both units in this Regiment of Renown are within each other’s combat range, pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn:

Evasive Approach: While both units in this Regiment of Renown are within each other’s combat range, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target them.

Ferocious Attack: While both units in this Regiment of Renown are within each other’s combat range, their Allopex’s Ferocious Bites have Crit (2 Hits).

other.name: In the Shadow of the Ethersea
other.lore: Though their allies may not understand the nature of the ethersea, they have come to rely on the advantages it provides in battle as the Idoneth advance out of sight of the enemy.
other.declare: This ability must be used to deploy this Regiment of Renown instead of the Deploy Unit ability or the Deploy Regiment ability.
other.effect: Set up the units in this Regiment of Renown in reserve in the ethersea. They have now been deployed.

other.name: Launch the Attack
other.lore: There is a sudden blur of movement as these Namarti warriors burst forth from an unseen quarter.
other.declare: Pick each unit in this Regiment of Renown that is in the ethersea.
other.effect: Set up each unit on the battlefield wholly within 7" of a battlefield edge, more than 9" from all enemy units and within the combat range of another unit in this Regiment of Renown. Then, each unit can immediately move D3". The units cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

battleTraits.name: The Last Living Cythai
battleTraits.lore: High King Volturnos is the greatest Idoneth warrior to have ever lived, and few can match his blinding speed in battle.

battleTraits.name: Teachings of the Asydrazor
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: As part of their asydrazor training, Akhelians must study the strategic theorems and methods of war set down by the legendary Cythai heroes of yore.

battleTraits.name: The Shield of Ulchiss
battleTraits.lore: Mastery of the ebb and flow of battle is core to the teachings of Ulchiss, which state that a timely withdrawal can open up enemy vulnerabilities.
battleTraits.declare: You must spend 1 asydrazor point each time a friendly FIRST PHALANX unit uses this ability. Pick a friendly unit in combat to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

•  That unit can use a RETREAT ability and still use SHOOT and/or CHARGE abilities later in the turn.
•  No mortal damage is inflicted on that unit by RETREAT abilities.

battleTraits.name: The Spear of Asphoren
battleTraits.lore: Those Idoneth who wish to follow the example of legendary commander Asphoren must strike at the foe like the surging tide.
battleTraits.declare: You must spend 1 asydrazor point each time a friendly FIRST PHALANX unit uses this ability. Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for that unit for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: The Sword of Gwynnar
battleTraits.lore: To emulate Queen Gwynnar is to anticipate the enemy’s next move and gain the upper hand in combat.
battleTraits.declare: You must spend 1 asydrazor point each time a friendly FIRST PHALANX unit uses this ability. Pick a friendly unit in combat to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: That unit has STRIKE‑FIRST for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: The Ocean Conceals
battleTraits.lore: Hidden by the froth and churn of the ethersea, an Eidolon of Mathlann can emerge in the very midst of its enemies.
battleTraits.declare: This ability must be used to deploy the friendly CHORRILEUM EIDOLON instead of the ‘Deploy Unit’ ability or the ‘Deploy Regiment’ ability.
battleTraits.effect: Set up the friendly CHORRILEUM EIDOLON in reserve awaiting a summons. It has now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: Call Forth the Tsunami
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: When summoned to defend the legacy of the Idoneth, an Eidolon’s fury is terrible indeed.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have 3 or more chorrileum spirit points. Pick a friendly unit awaiting a summons to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Set up the target anywhere on the battlefield. Then, inflict D3 mortal damage on each enemy unit in combat with it.

battleTraits.name: Spirits of the Chorrileum
battleTraits.lore: The spirit matter that animates an Eidolon is a malleable force that ebbs and surges in power as battle ensues.
battleTraits.effect:
Each turn, you can gain up to 1 chorrileum spirit point. You gain 1 chorrileum spirit point the first time 1 of the following occurs in a turn:

• You make an unmodified casting roll of 8 or more for a friendly ISHARANN WIZARD.
• An enemy unit is destroyed while it is within 12" of any friendly ISHARANN units.
• A friendly unit is destroyed while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly ISHARANN units or while it is contesting an objective you control

battleTraits.name: Wrath of Mathlann
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: Calling upon every vestige its of strength and rage, the Eidolon comes crashing down upon the foe.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly CHORRILEUM EIDOLON unit that has not used any RAMPAGE abilities this turn to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: That unit can use 2 FIGHT abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, that unit has STRIKE‑LAST for the rest of the turn. The unit using this ability cannot use any other RAMPAGE abilities for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Concealing Tide
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Any Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Freezing and impenetrable mists descend across the battlefield.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you did not use it in the previous battle round and you have not used any other TIDAL abilities this battle round.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the battle round, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units that did not use any CHARGE abilities in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Swift Tide
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Any Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: The sheer rapidity of the sea’s advance sees the Idoneth outpace their foes.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you used the ‘Concealing Tide’ ability in the previous battle round and you have not used any other TIDAL abilities this battle round.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the battle round, friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units can use Run abilities and still use Shoot and/or Charge abilities later in the turn.

battleTraits.name: Sea's Embrace
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Those engulfed by the vast ocean can do nothing but await their fate.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you used the ‘Swift Tide’ ability in the previous battle round and you have not used any other TIDAL abilities this battle round.
battleTraits.effect: Friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units have STRIKE-FIRST for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Unpredictable Tide
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Only the Deepkin can anticipate the mercurial currents of the ocean.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you did not use it in the previous battle round and you have not used any other TIDAL abilities this battle round. Pick a friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN unit that is not in combat to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 7" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Inexorable Tide
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Any Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: When the tide sweeps in, no force of nature or magic can keep it at bay.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you used the ‘Unpredictable Tide’ ability in the previous battle round and you have not used any other TIDAL abilities this battle round.
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units for the rest of the battle round.

battleTraits.name: Storm's Wrath
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Woe to those caught in the path of the storm’s destructive fury.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you used the ‘Inexorable Tide’ ability in the previous battle round and you have not used any other TIDAL abilities this battle round.
battleTraits.effect: Friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units’ melee weapons have Crit (Mortal) for the rest of the turn.
